fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy

Class AbstractCyPhyComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, CyPhyComponentI

    public abstract class AbstractCyPhyComponent
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements CyPhyComponentI
    The class AbstractCyPhyComponent add the necessary properties and methods required to turn a standard BCM component into a cyber-physical one.

    Description

    Work in progress...

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2019-06-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • atomicModelDescriptors

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ComponentAtomicModelDescriptor> atomicModelDescriptors
        Map from root model URIs to the component atomic model descriptors that presents the corresponding local simulation architectures with the root models in the component as atomic models to be composed in global simulation architectures.

      • AbstractCyPhyComponent

        protected AbstractCyPhyComponent(int nbThreads,
                                 int nbSchedulableThreads)
        create a cyber-physical component.

        Contract

         pre     nbThreads >= 0 && nbSchedulableThreads >= 0
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nbThreads - number of standard threads.
        nbSchedulableThreads - number of schedulable threads.

      • AbstractCyPhyComponent

        protected AbstractCyPhyComponent(java.lang.String reflectionInboundPortURI,
                                 int nbThreads,
                                 int nbSchedulableThreads)
        create a cyber-physical component.

        Contract

         pre     reflectionInboundPortURI != null
 pre     nbThreads >= 0 && nbSchedulableThreads >= 0
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        reflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the reflection inbound port of the created component.
        nbThreads - number of standard threads.
        nbSchedulableThreads - number of schedulable threads.

      • createLocalArchitecture

        protected fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.Architecture createLocalArchitecture(java.lang.String modelURI)
                                                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        create and return the local simulation architecture of this cyber-physical component to describe its behaviour; modelURI must designate uniquely the architecture to be created as the URI of its root model.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null
 pre     !isInstalled(modelURI)
 pre     !atomicModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI)
 post    atomicModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI)
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the root model in the simulation architecture to be created.
        Returns:
        the local simulation architecture of this component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
